subject: Remove backend proxy code and simplify to Embedded Wallet SDK only
body:
The app now uses only the Fireblocks Embedded Wallet SDK with Supabase
Edge Functions. Removed all proxy backend related code and configuration.

- Delete src/api/ directory (proxy backend implementation)
- Delete backend-proxy.env configuration file
- Remove VITE_USE_EMBEDDED_WALLET_SDK and VITE_BACKEND_BASE_URL env vars
- Simplify vite.config.ts to always use api-embedded-wallet
- Clean up store files to remove conditional proxy logic
- Update page components to remove proxy mode checks
- Simplify FirebaseAuthManager.ts
- Update tsconfig.json paths for @api alias

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Remove backend proxy code and simplify to Embedded Wallet SDK only
